attributes.action: Force all NEETS (persons Not in Employment, Education or Training) to contribute positively in some way to society.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petition against the callous failings of the British Government to increasingly allow a perennial influx of those people who contribute absolutely nothing to society, but inexplicably feel that they can fleece off of the state and our hard earned taxes.

I propose that Gordon Brown and his government introduce policies to counteract this trend immediately.  

For example, NEETS must be able to prove that they cannot work before being eligible for benefits.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
